source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video features a scenery shot of Independence Hall in Philadelphia. The camera slowly tilts upward, revealing more of the building's iconic clock tower and the modern skyscrapers rising behind it. The scene is framed by a lush green lawn in the foreground and trees on either side.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video features a scenery shot of Independence Hall in Philadelphia. The camera slowly tilts upward, revealing more of the building's iconic clock tower and the modern skyscrapers rising behind it. The scene is framed by a lush green lawn in the foreground and trees on either side.

bad_caption: A group of cyclists rides past a large fountain in a city square. The camera pans to follow their movement as they circle around the fountain and then continue down a tree-lined avenue. Pedestrians cross the street in the background while pigeons scatter from the cyclistsâ€™ path.
